segments.text: Have you seen the new James Bond movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What did you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought it was better than the others-I really liked it . What did you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I liked it , too . It was exciting , but not over the top . Do you know what I mean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmm . That's what I thought too . I really liked the car chase , and the opening credit sequence was very exciting . And I always enjoy watching Pierce Brosnan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . He's brilliant . Did you like the title song ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not as much as last time , actually . What's the name of the American actor who was in the supporting role ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hum , Edward Norton , or something like that . Did you like him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . He was excellent . They worked well together , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I think the woman was better . She provided a good love interest . Lucky James Bond !
segments.speaker: S1
